body.name: Skechers Women's Go Train Arch Fit Viper Court Pro-Pickleball Sneaker
features: Origin Made in the USA or Imported

SKECHERS PICKLEBALL SHOES: workout in supportive comfort with Skechers Pickleball Pro court shoes (pickleball shoes for women); featuring Goodyear rubber outsoles that deliver enhanced traction for indoor and outdoor court play
RELAXED FIT: these tennis shoes feature a relaxed fit with an adjustable lace-up front (top of shoe) for a comfortable workout; breathable athletic mesh upper for a cooling effect
SKECHERS ARCH FIT (INSOLE CUSHION): these podiatrist-certified arch support insoles offer a podiatrist-designed shape developed with 20 years of data and 120,000 unweighted foot scans

ATHLETIC ACTIVITIES: pickleball, tennis, cross-training, badminton, volleyball, walking, running, treadmill, workouts, training, gym, lifting, multi-sport exercise; these can be worn year-round (winter, summer, fall, spring)
MULTI-PURPOSE (FUNCTION): add performance comfort to casual occasions; wear around the house, to and from work, business, for travel, or even while driving; the possibilities continue
body.description: Driven by innovation as a part of The Comfort Technology Company, Skechers Performance footwear is inspired by athletes and offers unmatched comfort and lightweight materials across a range of products for walking, running, golf and more. From everyday casual slip-ons for a morning stroll to serious running shoes that will help you compete, footwear for the golf course or pickleball court, rugged boots for outdoor adventures—Skechers Performance offers a complete range of comfortable options to support any active lifestyle.SKECHERS VIPER COURT - PICKLEBALL SHOESDETAILS:✔ Patented Skechers Arch Fit insole system with podiatrist-certified arch support✔ Podiatrist-designed shape developed with 20 years of data and 120,000 unweighted foot scans✔ Removable insole helps mold to your foot to reduce shock and increase weight dispersion✔ Goodyear Performance Outsole delivers enhanced traction, stability, and durability✔ Ultra-lightweight, responsive ULTRA FLIGHT cushioningCONSTRUCTION:★ Relaxed Fit for a roomy comfort fit at toe and forefoot★ Breathable athletic mesh upper with a lace-up front★ Skechers Arch Fit and Pickleball logo detail★ Soft collar for supreme comfort★ Athletic comfort sneaker design

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: VIPER COURT - PICKLEBALL SHOES Workout in confidence and supportive comfort with Skechers Relaxed Fit: Viper Court - Pickleball Shoes. This lace-up features a synthetic and mesh upper with a removable Arch Fit insole, lightweight ULTRA FLIGHT cushioning, and a Goodyear Performance Outsole. UPPER (TOP OF SHOE) UPPER: Relaxed Fit for a roomy comfort fit at toe and forefootAthletic mesh upper with a lace-up front. Soft padded collar and tongue for supreme comfort. INSOLE: Patented Skechers Arch Fit insole system with podiatrist-certified arch support. Podiatrist-designed shape developed with 20 years of data and 120,000 unweighted foot scans. Removable insole helps mold to your foot to reduce shock and increase weight dispersion. CUSHION MIDSOLE CUSHION: Ultra-lightweight, responsive ULTRA FLIGHT cushioning. OUTSOLE/BOTTOM: Goodyear Performance Outsole delivers enhanced traction, stability and durability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars lightweight and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I wore these shoes for the 1st time today and they felt great! Lightweight and comfortable. My previous shoes are leather and heavy and stiff. So far so good! I sized down 1/2 size and I'm happy with the fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So happy to find Sketchers Pickleball shoes!
reviews.reviewText: After wearing out my Asics gel soles, I bought their new model. They were horrible and badly bruised my upper foot. Was trying to figure out what to buy because I need extra cushion since I have a neuroma and sesamoiditis. Just happened to see an advertisement for Sketchers PB shoes. Ordered normal size and half size up. My regular size fit perfectly. They were comfortable right out of the box! I don't need my orthotics in them because the arch support is really good. Toe box is wide and comfortable without feeling like my foot is unstable. Very stable on the court but not motion hindering at all. I hope they last longer than my Asics and continue to be this comfortable! If they do, they will be the only PB shoe I'll buy from now on. Love them so far! (I play PB 4-6 times/week)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great shoe overall!
reviews.reviewText: The shoes are great overall! Love the colors. Very comfortable. Only 4 starts because keeping the laces tight is an issue. Can’t understand why but I have to re-tie them several times during games.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable Pickleball shoes
reviews.reviewText: I really like these shoes for Pickleball. Good support and very comfortable. True to size. My favorite from all the Pickkeball shoes I have worn. And I love the colour!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Shoelaces too short
reviews.reviewText: The toe box on this shoe is comfortable. The support is fine when you lace all the eyelets so they support your ankles. They are my usual size and fit well. Unacceptable shoe laces -they are too short to use if you want to include the last outlet. Skechers please check make your laces the acceptable length -Should not have to purchase shoelaces for a brand new pair of shoes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got these for my wife who is crazy about pickleball. She says they have made her much better player. Much more stability

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This shoe is rated high and delivers as promised. There is a large amount of support and the sole of the shoe allows the foot to be planted firmly without causing undo stress on the plantar surface. The only negative I've found is that it runs a little large. I typically wear a womans size 7 in a sport shoe and this size 7 shoe is a little long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely wonderful for playing Pickleball! Balanced & secure.
